title: APPLIQUE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure an applique.

The applique is identified by the physical slot number. The left-most slot in 
the shelf is number 1. The following parameter can be configured for the slot:
  - planned-type: the applique type to be inserted into the slot. The 
not-planned parameter indicates that an applique will not be inserted into that 
slot.
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure equipment applique (index) [ no planned-type | planned-type <Equipm::AppliqueType> ] [ no applique-profile | applique-profile <Equipm::CapabilityProfile> ]

resource_parameters.name: (index)
resource_parameters.description: the physical number of the applique

command_parameters.name: [no] planned-type
command_parameters.description: type of applique intended to be in this position optional parameter with default value: "not-planned"
command_parameters.format: Data driven field type                            Possible values are depending on the actual configuration and software.                            The currently allowed values can be shown with online-help.

command_parameters.name: [no] applique-profile
command_parameters.description: capability profile assigned to the applique board optional parameter with default value: "not_applicable"
command_parameters.format: Data driven field type                            Possible values are depending on the actual configuration and software.                            The currently allowed values can be shown with online-help.

raw:
help configure equipment applique
APPLIQUE CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==============================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure an applique.

The applique is identified by the physical slot number. The left-most slot in 
the shelf is number 1. The following parameter can be configured for the slot:
  - planned-type: the applique type to be inserted into the slot. The 
not-planned parameter indicates that an applique will not be inserted into that 
slot.


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure equipment applique (index) [ no planned-type | planned-type 
<Equipm::AppliqueType> ] [ no applique-profile | applique-profile 
<Equipm::CapabilityProfile> ]

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "Applique Configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(index)                    the physical number of the applique

Table "Applique Configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

[no] planned-type          type of applique intended to be in this position
                           optional parameter with default value: "not-planned"

                           Parameter type: <Equipm::AppliqueType>
                           Format:
                           Data driven field type
                           Possible values are depending on the actual 
configuration and software.
                           The currently allowed values can be shown with 
online-help.

[no] applique-profile      capability profile assigned to the applique board
                           optional parameter with default value: 
"not_applicable"

                           Parameter type: <Equipm::CapabilityProfile>
                           Format:
                           Data driven field type
                           Possible values are depending on the actual 
configuration and software.
                           The currently allowed values can be shown with 
online-help.


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
